Chap. 6 - High Spiritual Standards for God's Workmen

     Greater Spirituality Needed in Adventist Centers.--In the centers that are formed in some places, there is constant temptation to carry the work after worldly methods. I have had presented before me the dangers before us in the future. This light I have tried to present with pen and with voice. Let the work be carried forward intelligently by men and women of sound faith and strict religious principle.
